Articles.Content: Hi folks, I just installed .25 and now can't use the space center or launch anything. I get an error saying "Too many heap sections" and then am forced to quit. The only mod I have is Mechjeb2.
Please refer to this and get back with us.
We definitely need more details; the sticky will show you a sample issue report that shows the details we need.

You have a computer with 4GB RAM or less or a 32bit OS by any chance?

Edited October 29, 2014 by slumpie

Ok embarrassment on my part. I had 2 copies of mechjeb in 2 different folders. Must have slipped on a folder copy along the line and not realized it. At least we know now that this will crash ksp. Now I can enjoy racing my rover around on eve at 20 m/s without taking my finger off the forward key again!! Bliss!
